import React from 'react'; import imgA from '../components/img/‏‏imgA.png'; import imgD from './img/‏‏imgD.png'; import { Button, Row, Col } from 'react-bootstrap'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import { useContext } from 'react'; import { UserContext } from '../contexts/UserContext'; export default function Home() { const { currentUser } = useContext(UserContext); // const url = "http://localhost:3000/"; return (

Welcome {currentUser.firstName}

Welcome to our platform. Here, you can post your trips to the makolet, ask a neighbor to bring you something from teh makolet if you are in potatoe-mode, through a simple point system.

How does it work?

First, you need to log-in or sign up to participate When you sign up, you are awarded 20 points.
Every time you ask for something, you give that person point.
Every time you bring something to a potatoe, you earn points.
Simple enough, isn't it?

); }
